description: Specify ball group names. Groups are used to organize balls and apply commands to specific subsets. By default, the group name is assigned to the slot 'Default'. IMPORTANT: The 'add' and 'remove' keywords apply to ALL balls (or a previously active range), they cannot be combined with a 'range' keyword in the same command.

keywords.name: slot
keywords.description: Assign group s to slot s2 (default slot: 'Default'). Can be combined with range

keywords.name: add
keywords.description: Assign group s to next available slot for ALL balls (cannot be used with range in same command)

keywords.name: remove
keywords.description: Remove group s from all slots for ALL balls (cannot be used with range in same command)

examples.description: Assign balls in y-position range to group 'top_grip' (default slot, from official docs)

examples.command: ball group 'inclusions' range circle center -1.0 -3.0 radius 0.5
examples.description: Assign balls within circular region to group 'inclusions' (from official docs)
Assign balls in z-range to group 'layer1' in slot 'layer'
Assign balls with IDs 1-100 to group 'active' in default slot
Assign ALL balls to group 'active' in next available slot
Remove group 'old_group' from all balls in all slots
Assign balls in x-range to group 'BackLeft' (based on official docs pattern)
